Query: select it.name as Tag, round((sum(quantity * unit_price) / ( select sum(quantity * unit_price) from sales_invoice as si1 left join sales_invoice_detail as sid1 on si1.id_sales_invoice = sid1.id_sales_invoice ) * 100), 2) as Percentage from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sid on sid.id_sales_invoice = si.id_sales_invoice left join items as i on i.id_item = sid.id_item left join item_tag_detail as itd on itd.id_item = i.id_item left join item_tag as it on it.id_tag = itd.id_tag where si.id_company = 1 group by it.id_tag order by it.id_tag
Caption: Tags as Percentage of Sales
Label: Tag
